summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jes Staley, discussing a planned visit to Beijing and Shanghai in December 2009. Staley is seeking recommendations for key individuals to meet in those cities.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email, inquiring about contacts in Beijing and Shanghai.

persons.name: Gaby A Abdelnour
persons.context: Gaby A Abdelnour is one of the recipients of the email, being asked for recommendations on contacts in China.

persons.name: Erik G Ortel
persons.context: Erik G Ortel is included as a recipient in the email correspondence.

persons.name: Juliet N Pullis
persons.context: Juliet N Pullis is also a recipient of the email.

persons.name: David L C Hsu
persons.context: David L C Hsu is copied on the email, indicating he is part of the communication chain.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jes Staley on November 4, 2009.
Staley is seeking advice on whom to meet in Beijing and Shanghai during a planned visit in December.
The email includes multiple recipients, indicating a network of contacts.
